revised_title: Quantum Mechanical Discussion of Cohesive Forces and Thermal Expansion Coefficients of Alkali Metals
tldr: The authors present a quantum mechanical analysis of the cohesive forces and thermal expansion coefficients of alkali metals. They develop a method to calculate these properties using simple analytical methods and wave functions, which agree well with previous calculations and experimental results. The study provides insights into the behavior of alkali metals and their properties under various conditions.
